mapper.select: select * from study_report where project_id=#{projectId} and del_flag=0
SELECT id,project_id,project_name, appendix,approve,approve_opinion, study_organization_unit,invest_scale, construction_content FROM study_report WHERE del_flag = 0 and project_id = #{projectId}
